channel.title: Democracy on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)
channel.description: Recent content in Democracy on विचारमञ्जरी (Vichāramañjarī)

item.title: Democracy and Secularism in India | Is it time to Change? Or was it Always Broken...
item.description: A concise look at why India’s service-led growth diverges from the “land → manufacturing → finance” model of East Asia, and why rebuilding a manufacturing base is vital for inclusive prosperity.
